description:
An Eric Adams staffer excused herself from an FBI interview to go to the bathroom, allegedly to delete encrypted messaging apps.

The post Encrypted Apps Can Protect Your Privacy — Unless You Use Them Like Eric Adams appeared first on The Intercept.
title: Encrypted Apps Can Protect Your Privacy — Unless You Use Them Like Eric Adams

description:
The military tech conference was set for November at one of Google's Tel Aviv offices — but was scrubbed from the internet when the Intercept asked questions.

The post Google Was Set to Host An Israeli Military Conference. When We Asked About It, The Event Disappeared. appeared first on The Intercept.
title: Google Was Set to Host An Israeli Military Conference. When We Asked About It, The Event Disappeared.
